snippet: No. 5 Duke beat Virginia Commonwealth, 79-71, in the opening round of the 2K Classic on Friday night at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Duke defeats Virginia Commonwealth, 79-71, in opening round of 2K Classic; other men's and women's college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: No. 5 Duke beat Virginia Commonwealth, 79-71, in the opening round of the 2K Classic on Friday night at Madison Square Garden.

headline.print_headline: Allen’s 30 Points Lead Duke Past V.C.U. at 2K Classic
headline.main: Allen’s 30 Points Lead Duke Past V.C.U. at 2K Classic
